name: Snekky 2 - Return To Popistein Demo Only (In Dev)
name_original: Snekky 2 - Return To Popistein Demo Only (In Dev)
description:
D1 is back!!! This is the sequel to Snekky - The Video Game and its better then the 1st by a lot.

Only the  demo here, any bugs will be fixed in the final release and this description please make every single bit of criticism you can possibly make like please.

Demo ends when you teleport to the other side of the Clone Base.

Demo Updates will probably be made (We have made Updates)

You should set your texture filter mode to "none" for a better graphical experience, it's in the display settings :)

Use our GoFundMe to support the Development of the Sequel and to publish our game onto Steam:

https://www.gofundme.com/f/uploading-snekky-the-video-game-through-steam?utm_source=customer

  • Snekky is GOD subscribe to Snekky7 on Youtube and Follow on Twitch with snekky7_
